allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Add responsive design with aspect ratio preservation" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Changed stretch mode from `viewport` to `canvas_items` for smoother scaling
- Added `keep` aspect ratio to maintain 16:9 while filling the viewport
- Scene now properly scales on different screen sizes with letterboxing

## Test plan
- [ ] Run the game and resize the window
- [ ] Verify the game maintains 16:9 aspect ratio
- [ ] Verify letterboxing appears on non-16:9 displays

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Add basic game mechanics with credits and time system" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Added HUD with casino marker showing player credits and remaining hours
- Player starts with $100 credits and 8 hours
- Each spin costs $1 and takes 0.5 hours
- Marker positioned in top-left corner with pixel art background
- Game prevents spinning when out of credits or time

## Test plan
- [ ] Run the game and verify HUD shows $100 and 8 hours
- [ ] Spin the reels and verify credits decrease by $1 and hours by 0.5
- [ ] Verify game stops allowing spins when credits or hours run out

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Add slot machine lever with pull animation" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Added red ball handle lever on right side of reels that triggers spin when clicked
- Lever animates down when pulled and springs back up
- Made lever and casino marker images transparent
- Added eggshell background color to scene
- Hidden spin button and credits label \(using HUD marker instead\)

## Test plan
- [ ] Run the game and click on the lever
- [ ] Verify the lever animates down and triggers the spin
- [ ] Verify the lever and marker have transparent backgrounds
- [ ] Verify eggshell background is visible behind all elements

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
